fields.name: tocIsHidden
fields.label: Hide Table of Contents
fields.description: Hide the Table of Contents on this page and expand the content window.

fields.name: codeLineStart
fields.label: Code Line Start
fields.description: Enter negative values to highlight from 0 to your end number

fields.name: codeLineEnd
fields.label: Code Line End
fields.description: Highlighting will not work if end number is greater than start number

fields.name: heading
fields.label: Heading
fields.description: The heading text that will be displayed in the collapsed state

fields.name: groupName
fields.label: Group Name
fields.description: Adjacent properties with the same group name will be grouped together

fields.name: embedSrc
fields.label: Embed URL
fields.description: ⚠︎ Only YouTube embed URLs work - they look like this https://www.youtube.com/embed/Yoh2c5RUTiY

fields.name: minutes
fields.label: Minutes
fields.description: The duration of the video in minutes

fields.name: query
fields.label: Query
fields.description: Paste GraphQL query here. '#' are auto-inserted as spacing placeholders and should not be used.

fields.name: response
fields.label: Response
fields.description: Paste GraphQL response data here. '#' are auto-inserted as spacing placeholders and should not be used.

fields.name: preselectResponse
fields.label: Select Response by Default
fields.description: Select the response tab by default

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
